entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Puvirnituq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:24 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -36.3°C
entry.summary:

Pressure: 101.8 kPa

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 30 km/h. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 50 this evening and minus 56 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 33. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 33. Wind chill minus 56 in the morning and minus 49 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 37. Wind chill near minus 53. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
